title: Lynda - Designing Web Sites from Photoshop to Dreamweaver
description:
Lynda - Designing Web Sites from Photoshop to Dreamweaver

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

3h 4m Beginner Mar 06, 2012   | Uploaded in Oct 7, 2015 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software: Dreamweaver Photoshop 
Author: Sue Jenkins 

This course teaches web design beginners how to turn their design in Photoshop into a fully functioning web site in Dreamweaver. Sue Jenkins shows how to create mockups, slice, and optimize web graphics, and build a site using the Dreamweaver HTML and CSS templates. The course also covers how to customize HTML and CSS to style and position content, test and validate code, and use FTP to transfer finished site files to a host server. Postlaunch site maintenance is also discussed so that designers can keep their web sites up to date. Exercise files are included with the course.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Setting up the Photoshop and Dreamweaver workspaces
	â€¢	Planning a site and defining site goals
	â€¢	Mocking up the layout and navigation
	â€¢	Deciding on fonts and colors
	â€¢	Styling the header, main content, sidebar, and footer
	â€¢	Optimizing web graphics
	â€¢	Building page structure with divs
	â€¢	Building menus
	â€¢	Adding metadata and externalizing CSS
	â€¢	Creating templates with editable regions
	â€¢	Creating template-based pages and adding content
	â€¢	Inserting form fields
	â€¢	Adding SEO, metadata, and accessibility markup
	â€¢	Testing, validating, and publishing projects
